ygData.subject: Re: Planes Raids
ygData.msgSnippet: From my experiences, the Ranger does not experience any ANTI-ranger bias, just not the Most Favored Nation status like Clerics and Enchanters in Raids and
ygData.messageBody:
From my experiences, the Ranger does not
experience any ANTI-ranger bias, just not the Most Favored
Nation status like Clerics and Enchanters in Raids and
groups from 40+. <br><br>I guess I'm just jealous of
Clerics & chanters because it's easier for them to find
groups easily....hehe <br><br>Rangers are definitely the
most fun class in the game to play for me. We have
extremely high Damage output and our spells make us a nice
"Swiss Army Knife" of the classes. Plus, whenever I play
my Alt characters of other classes, I feel naked
without Track. I use Track to navigate zones soooo much
it's almost like cheating... P
